summary: This code aims to create a function that is independent of its execution place. It recognizes the difficulty in achieving this without advanced understanding and requires parsing both immutable and mutable parts.

details.comment: This code aims to create a function that is independent of its execution place. It recognizes the difficulty in achieving this without advanced understanding and requires parsing both immutable and mutable parts.
details.content:
Make a function independent of execution place. However this is impossible without sophisticated understanding.
Must parse immutable parts and mutable ones.
